attributes.action: Not to change the House of Lords, and to return it to the way it was before it was reformed, and to give it more powers above the House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the Government do not abolish the House of Lords, and to return it to the way it was before it was reformed. Hereditry peers should automaticaly go to the House of Lords Without being elected, and also to stop the degrading of the House of Lords, by giving peerages out to anyone. Also, to give ultimate power to the Lords, above the House of Commons. The House of Lords is a great British tradition, do not let it slip away.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
